title: China vows 'more proactive' fiscal stimulus measures, 'moderately' looser monetary policy
content: China's leaders pledged "more proactive" fiscal and monetary policies next year to boost domestic consumption, according to an official readout.
summary: China's leaders pledged "more proactive" fiscal and monetary policies next year to boost domestic consumption, according to an official readout.

title: China consumer inflation rate drops to a five-month low, missing expectations as economy slows
content: China's consumer prices rose less-than-expected in November, climbing 0.2% from a year ago, according to data from the National Bureau of Statistics released Monday.
summary: China's consumer prices rose less-than-expected in November, climbing 0.2% from a year ago, according to data from the National Bureau of Statistics released Monday.

title: China's top leaders are set to discuss GDP growth target, stimulus measures amid economic worries
content: Market participants will watch the events this week for clues on how policymakers plan to steer the economy through entrenched disinflation and looming U.S. tariffs.
summary: Market participants will watch the events this week for clues on how policymakers plan to steer the economy through entrenched disinflation and looming U.S. tariffs.

title: Qatar energy minister: I don't 'worry much' about Trump's vow to lift LNG exports cap
content: "Additional LNG and additional competition is welcome," told CNBC's Dan Murphy at the Doha Forum.
summary: "Additional LNG and additional competition is welcome," told CNBC's Dan Murphy at the Doha Forum.

title: President-elect Trump says Ukraine to 'possibly' receive less military aid
content: President-elect Trump tells NBC News Ukraine will likely receive less U.S. aid once he takes office.

title: From failed accountant to Marvel and Barbie star: Simu Liu shares how he got out of 'rock bottom'
content: Actor Simu Liu was fired from Deloitte before becoming an actor. He's now investing in Asian American businesses and is outspoken about tackling discrimination.
summary: Actor Simu Liu was fired from Deloitte before becoming an actor. He's now investing in Asian American businesses and is outspoken about tackling discrimination.

title: He bought a KFC store in Australia for $100,000 in 1969. Today, his fast food company is worth over $3 billion

summary: Jack Cowin, founder and chairman of Competitive Foods Australia, shares his "biggest break" in life, which ultimately made him a billionaire.

title: McDonald's fired Pharrell Williams 3 times—and then he created its famous jingle 'I'm loving it'
content: Music producer Pharrell Williams didn't last long as a McDonald's employee, he said — he suffered primarily from what an expert calls "burnout by boredom."
summary: Music producer Pharrell Williams didn't last long as a McDonald's employee, he said — he suffered primarily from what an expert calls "burnout by boredom."

title: Assad dynasty collapses in Syria as rebel forces claim Damascus
content: The defense forces of the Russia and Iran-backed Assad government have been struggling to stave off the lightning advance of rebel forces.

title: Google CEO: AI development is finally slowing down—'the low-hanging fruit is gone’
content: Google CEO Sundar Pichai says AI development may feel slower in 2025 — and tech companies will "need deeper breakthroughs" than today's chatbots to get ahead.

title: South Korea's President Yoon survives impeachment motion after ruling party boycotts vote
content: The motion, tabled by opposition politicians, needed the support of two-thirds of South Korea's 300-member National Assembly to pass.
summary: The motion, tabled by opposition politicians, needed the support of two-thirds of South Korea's 300-member National Assembly to pass.

title: The weight-loss drug boom has become one of the internet's biggest scams
content: As demand for obesity drugs like Wegovy, Zepbound, Mounjaro and Ozempic, outpaces supply,  online scams are rising, according to cybersecurity experts.

title: I bought one of Sicily's famous $1 homes and spent $446K renovating it—take a look inside

title: Payrolls increased 227,000 in November, more than expected; unemployment rate at 4.2%

title: A 'hidden' travel hack saves money on flights — if travelers can pull it off

title: OPEC+ oil output delay a 'reality check’ as group eyes demand, U.S. outlook, Saudi energy min says

title: Brian Thompson killing: Police believe person of interest left New York

title: I left Texas for Spain and have helped thousands of Americans move abroad: 'There’s never been a better time to make the leap'

title: India's central bank revises down economic growth forecast for 2025, keeps interest rate steady
content: The Reserve Bank of India has held interest rate steady since February last year, while a sharper-than-anticipated slowdown in India's growth has made RBI's task tougher.
summary: The Reserve Bank of India has held interest rate steady since February last year, while a sharper-than-anticipated slowdown in India's growth has made RBI's task tougher.
